articles.title: Why Colin Powell remained vulnerable to COVID-19 despite being fully vaccinated - CBC.ca
articles.description: Despite being fully vaccinated against COVID-19, Colin Powell remained vulnerable to the virus due to his advanced age and history of cancer, highlighting the continued risk to many Americans until more of the population is immunized.
articles.content:
The death of former U.S. secretary of state Colin Powell from COVID-19 complications has left some people wondering how he became so sick since he had received both of his shots against the virus.

articles.author: Mark Moore
articles.title: GOP rep warns US could lose 'new Cold War' with China following missile launch - New York Post
articles.description: Rep. Mike Gallagher is warning that America could lose the “new Cold War” with China in the next decade, after Beijing’s launch of a nuclear-capable hypersonic missile.
